flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction: Ever wish you owned lots of those expensive designer tapes to use in your projects and artworks? Now you can make your own and always have beautiful colorful tape available anytime you need it.
guide.introduction_rendered: Ever wish you owned lots of those expensive designer tapes to use in your projects and artworks? Now you can make your own and always have beautiful colorful tape available anytime you need it.
guide.summary: Learn how to turn regular masking tape into gorgeous works of art ready to use in your next project or artwork.  Its just like having lots of those designer tapes, but better because you made it!
guide.title: Art Tape
